= authorinfo =

Information about an author.

=== Parameters: ===

|| *Name*   || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| url      || string || URL string for the author. (required) ||

=== Example: ===
{{{
http://otter.topsy.com/authorinfo.json?url=http://twitter.com/barackobama
}}}

This will fetch information about Barack Obama's Twitter profile.
